title: Wrong promo series score
body: I was playing ranked on my smurf today, i got in promos for silver 2, when suddenly without even playing one of the games i got a Loss. I took a break before going in the promos. I have no idea why. Even my match history has my wins without a loss. The summoner name is Bru7alMan.

replies.body: This happened to me earlier in the year, I just got Kalista and tried her in a custom game against bots and after I got a feel for her I left the game, it counted as a loss in my promos to silver.
It was probably that you dodged a game...pwnd yourself eh?

dude....this has happened to me twice now. i tweeted riot support pictures of it for proof, and their response was "are you sure you didnt accidentally play a ranked game?"  im like i tweeted you pics of my match history and the league screen, and it clearly shows my last ranked game was a win...yet somehow i have a ranked promos loss without playing one. raise some hell about it cuz they wouldnt listen to me that its their game screwing something up.
